def bestbats():
    t = int(raw_input())
    
    while (t > 0):
        t -= 1
        
        #print "Number of tests left: ", t
        
        runArray = map(int, raw_input().split())
        n = int(raw_input())
        
        #print "The array of scores: ", runArray
        #print "The number of scores in the highest sum: ", n
        
        runArray.sort()
        runArray = runArray[::-1]
        
        #print "Run array in descending order: ", runArray
        
        maxRunArray = runArray[:n]
        
        #print "Run Array of maximum scores: ", maxRunArray
        
        combinationCount = 0
        
        for i in xrange(n):
            if i == 0 or maxRunArray[i] != maxRunArray[i-1]:
                #print "Checking count of value: ", maxRunArray[i]
                maxRunCount = maxRunArray.count(maxRunArray[i])
                #print "Count in maximum run array is: ", maxRunCount
                runCount = runArray.count(runArray[i])
                #print "Count in run array is: ", runCount
                if runCount > maxRunCount:
                    combinationCount += (factorial(runCount)/(factorial(maxRunCount)*factorial(runCount-maxRunCount)))
                    #print "Combination count is now: ", combinationCount
        
        if combinationCount == 0:
            combinationCount = 1
        
        print combinationCount
    pass

def factorial(n):
    if n == 0:
        return 1
    return n * factorial(n-1)

bestbats()
